description: Suffolk Construction is a large national construction management firm founded in 1982, headquartered in Boston, MA, with approximately 2,800 employees. It operates across multiple U.S. regions including Boston, New York, Miami, West Palm Beach, Tampa, Estero, Dallas, Los Angeles, San Francisco, San Diego, Portland, and Herndon. The company specializes in sectors such as healthcare, education, gaming, government, mission critical, commercial, and residential construction, delivering comprehensive, integrated project lifecycle services including construction management, capital investment, design, self-perform trade services, and technology innovation.
region: National US presence with headquarters in Boston and multiple regional offices
other_locations: New York, Miami, West Palm Beach, Tampa, Estero, Dallas, Los Angeles, San Francisco, San Diego, Portland, Herndon, Las Vegas
technology_stack: Salesforce, Signal, Open Graph, Microsoft Azure, Suffolk Technologies (venture capital and innovation platform), BIM, VDC, construction management software
target_decision_makers: John F. Fish (CEO), Puneet Mahajan (CFO), Tim Stroud (COO), Ralph Esposito (National President), Jay Tangney (General Counsel), Procurement Managers including Ted Pollack, Mariel VanAtta, Michael O'Donoghue, Scott McLean
software_decision_makers: Likely procurement managers and executive leadership such as Ted Pollack, Mariel VanAtta, Michael O'Donoghue, Scott McLean; C-level executives include CEO John F. Fish, CFO Puneet Mahajan, CIO David Starmer, CTO Jit Kee Chin

It operates across multiple U.S. regions including Boston, New York, Miami, West Palm Beach, Tampa, Estero, Dallas, Los Angeles, San Francisco, San Diego, Portland, and Herndon. The company specializes in sectors such as healthcare, education, gaming, government, mission critical, commercial, and residential construction, delivering comprehensive, integrated project lifecycle services including construction management, capital investment, design, self-perform trade services, and technology innovation.
